Tip of the Day
Skill levels exceeding a recipe's main skill requirement in the crafting interface provide additional Crafting outcome.

Coldington

From Walkscape Walkthrough

Other languages:
  • English

A small chapel is the main building of this humble town. Hymns of music echo softly throughout the streets. The people of this town may be cold, but their souls are warmed with hope and enlightenment.

Coldington is a location that can be found in the Jarvonia region.

Faction

Coldington is a member of the following factions:

Jarvonia

Activities

The following activities always available at this location.

Hut jumping
Branch trimming
Firewood making

Building

The following buildings can be visited at this location.

Clothing shop
Not a Shop

Services

The following services can be used at this location.

Basic Kitchen
Wardrobe

Routes

The following routes are available at this location.

  Centaham 
650 Base Steps
  Port Skildar 
354 Base Steps
  Azurazera 
370 Base Steps
 Coldington 
  Horn of Respite 
627 Base Steps
